title: Google hires The Verge’s Dieter Bohn to join Android & Chrome division
content:
Executive Editor of The Verge Dieter Bohn announced on Friday that he’s leaving the technology publication to join Google. 

more…

The post Google hires The Verge’s Dieter Bohn to join Android & Chrome division  appeared first on 9to5Google.
